fields.content:
Singer-songwriter Ben Westwood performs as a duo with multi-instrumentalist Scott Doane, playing a range of acoustic originals and covers that blend folk, blues, rock and soul. Ben plays gigs across the South-East on the back of two albums released to critical acclaim. He has been featured in local and national media including BBC Sussex and The Daily Telegraph.
http://benwestwoodmusic.com/

Tickets are only £5 per person.

Book your tickets in bubbles by emailing us at: info@printersplayhouse.co.uk

All events are in pre-booked ‘bubbles’
fields.excerpt: Singer-songwriter Ben Westwood performs as a duo with multi-instrumentalist Scott Doane, playing a range of acoustic originals and covers that blend folk, blues, rock and soul.
fields.title: Ben Westwood

fields.content:
A fabulously festive Christmas concert, performed by West End professionals Natalie Roberts and Viv Berry.

Book your two hour bubble, ticket includes free mince pie or gingerbread man! 

December 24th. Doors at 2.00pm and 4.00pm  £10/£7 cons

Please email info@printersplayhouse.co.uk to book your table bubble.
fields.excerpt: A fabulously festive Christmas concert, performed by West End professionals Natalie Roberts and Viv Berry.
fields.title: ‘It’s Beginning to look a lot like Christmas’

fields.content:
Musicians, poets, storytellers, comedians are all welcome! Basically anyone who needs a mic to express their art.
Come and enjoy the best open mic in Eastbourne!
Wednesday 9th December 7pm - 10pm
£5 deposit for performers and audience, which can be claimed back against your first drink at the bar.
Anyone attending (performers or audience members) need to book your performance slot and your bubble's table before the event, by emailing us at: info@printersplayhouse.co.uk .
Please bring your own microphone if singing, and make sure you have booked to perform well before the event as places are limited.
All events are pre-booked in bubbles for everyone's safety.
fields.excerpt: Musicians, poets, storytellers, comedians are all welcome! Basically anyone who needs a mic to express their art.
fields.title: Open Stage

fields.content:
Join big Al Arcane and the Nightrider for a COVID Safe performance!

Big Al's musical project is to blend traditional Rhythm 'n Blues with modern styling to create an inclusion that celebrates cultural variety. He enjoys roots music; blues, boogie and the jazz developed from these influences.

7.45pm start, tickets £5

Book your tickets in bubbles by emailing us at: info@printersplayhouse.co.uk

All events are in pre-booked ‘bubbles’
fields.excerpt: Join big Al Arcane and the Nightrider for a COVID Safe performance!
fields.title: Big Al Arcane and the Nightrider

fields.content:
Rise and Rhyme Spoken Word night has been rescheduled for Friday 4th December if the government chooses not to extend the current lockdown. If we are still in lockdown the event will be moved to January 2021.

For anyone who has purchased a ticket and can no longer make it for Friday 4th 

December, please contact viv@printersplayhouse.co.uk for a refund.

We will be joined by our headliner Shell Huggett performing with Jakob. We also have MC G-Funk, spoken word poets -M.Jumbo, Pixie, J.Berry, Rambling Rose, G.Jones and story-teller Hazel plus many more more..!!!
fields.excerpt: Rise and Rhyme Spoken Word night has been rescheduled for Friday 4th December.
fields.title: Rise and Rhyme

fields.content:
We are delighted to present a rather unconventional retro reimagining of classic pantomime ‘Beastie & the Beaut’ for this years PPH Community Cast Christmas show!

It is completely staged and performed in COVID safe bubbles, and we will be taking bookings by bubble groups too.

Tickets are £10 or £7 for concessions.

Book your tickets in groups by emailing us at: info@printersplayhouse.co.uk .

Fri 18th 7.30pm
Sat 19th 2.30pm & 6.30pm
Sun 20th 2.30pm & 6.30pm

Doors open half an hour before!
fields.excerpt: We are delighted to present a rather unconventional retro reimagining of classic pantomime ‘Beastie & the Beaut’ for this years PPH Community Cast Christmas show!
fields.title: Beastie & the Beaut

fields.content:
Printers at the Grove
A new play by John Berry

In these tough times, Life’s a struggle. There’s unfulfilled expectations. Humdrum existences needing an injection of life. Millions wishing something, would happen to them, to fill the void in their lives. Clearly everyone “else” is happy. Online celebrations and holiday pics prove it. Jane can’t take it anymore. She needs that something, anything! but how far is she willing to go to get it?

Jo didn’t understand.

Jo is happy to just get along.

Having normal couple conversations and disagreements. Why do they see the world so differently?

Maybe “Mad Fran” has the answer. She at least has the life experience that would suggest she could help.

“Happenings” is a dark comedy involving 3 characters set in a seaside town. Their feelings about the world being matched by countless 30 somethings across the country.

If your life is made up of the things that happen to you, what if nothing happens?!

How much do you dare risk, to push your life agenda?

Advance booking only.
fields.excerpt:
Printers at the Grove
A new play by John Berry
fields.title: Happenings
